mapper.insert: insert into company(com_num, com_name, com_tel, com_addr, com_scale, com_business, com_contract) values (com_seq.NEXTVAL, #{com_name}, #{com_tel}, #{com_addr}, #{com_scale}, #{com_business}, to_date(#{com_contract}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.update: update company set com_name = #{com_name}, com_tel =#{com_tel}, com_addr =#{com_addr}, com_scale =#{com_scale}, com_business =#{com_business}, com_contract =#{com_contract} where com_num = #{com_num}
mapper.select: SELECT com_num, com_name, com_tel, com_addr, com_scale, com_business, to_char(com_contract, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS com_contract FROM company where com_num = #{com_num}
